[`Workspace`](../Workspace) › [`activeEditor`](./activeEditor)

## Workspace.activeEditor property

A component managing the current editor. This can be null if the active view has no editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
activeEditor: MarkdownFileInfo | null;
```
